content: अनुदार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not liberal, niggardly; not high or noble. {@--2@} Having none more liberal, very liberal, or great. {@--3@} (अनुगतो दारान्) Adhering to or followed by a wife; यस्मिन्प्रसीदसि पुनः स भवत्युदारोऽनुदारश्च <ls>K. P. 4</ls> (used in sense 1 also). {@--4@} Having a suitable or worthy wife (अनुरूपाः दाराः यस्य).
